thread.title: RapidMiner Announces Partnership and Certification on Cloudera Enabling End Users to Monetize their Hadoop Investments
thread.title_full: RapidMiner Announces Partnership and Certification on Cloudera Enabling End Users to Monetize their Hadoop Investments

author: admin
title: RapidMiner Announces Partnership and Certification on Cloudera Enabling End Users to Monetize their Hadoop Investments
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/29/2015 @ 5:01 AM   RapidMiner 
CAMBRIDGE, Mass., Sept. 29, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Strata + Hadoop World New York 2015 -- RapidMiner (TM), the industry's #1 open source predictive analytics platform, today announced the availability of a joint offering with Cloudera. The combined solution enables end users to effortlessly mine and model data-- no coding required --mashup all data for a holistic business view, rapidly build predictive models to uncover opportunities and risks and operationalize predictive models by embedding them within business processes. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150812/258054LOGO 
RapidMiner Radoop is certified on Cloudera Enterprise and automatically creates and executes an optimal analytics plan. It pushes analytic instructions into Cloudera where predictive analytics are executed across the entire cluster. This provides end users with more complete and prescriptive insights that are actionable and allow businesses to take advantage of the value in Hadoop. 
"We welcome RapidMiner into the Cloudera ecosystem and are pleased that they have certified on Cloudera," said Tim Stevens, vice president, Business and Corporate Development, at Cloudera. "With our joint offering, customers benefit from the processing power of the Cloudera Enterprise to easily extract and operationalize the hidden value in their Hadoop clusters. RapidMiner's leading open source predictive analytics solution helps customers accelerate time-to-value and harness the power of their data." 
"Big data technologies and having the ability to extract value from Hadoop investments are critical for business analysts and data scientists," said Peter Y. Lee, CEO & President at RapidMiner. "Cloudera and RapidMiner, together, are enabling businesses to easily leverage the power of Hadoop, automatically create and execute an optimal analytics execution plan and focus on creating business value rather than the challenges of the implementation and back-end." 
Also today, RapidMiner announced the general availability of RapidMiner Radoop v2.6 , making it easy to incorporate SparkR and PySpark scripts within a single, unified analytics workflow. 
RapidMiner is exhibiting at Strata + Hadoop World New York 2015 at booth #419. If you are interested in meeting or for more information, please contact Payal Cudia at pcudia@rapidminer.com . 
About RapidMiner 
RapidMiner, the industry's #1 open source predictive analytics platform, is disrupting the industry by empowering enterprises to include predictive analytics in any business process--closing the loop between insight and action. RapidMiner's effortless solution makes predictive analytics lightning-fast for today's modern analysts, radically reducing the time to unearth opportunities and risks. RapidMiner delivers game-changing expertise from the largest worldwide predictive analytics community. For more information, visit www.rapidminer.com .
